title: Build a Responsive Website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
summary: Learn the fundamentals of web development by building a beautiful, responsive portfolio website from scratch. This tutorial covers modern CSS techniques like Flexbox and Grid.

title: React JS Crash Course
summary: Get up and running with React, the most popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. This crash course covers components, state, props, and hooks.

title: Build a Weather App with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS
summary: Create a stylish and functional weather application using Vue.js for the frontend logic and Tailwind CSS for rapid UI development. You'll learn how to work with third-party APIs.

title: Mastering CSS Grid Layout
summary: A deep dive into CSS Grid, one of the most powerful layout systems in CSS. This tutorial covers everything from the basics to advanced techniques for creating complex layouts.

title: Next.js 14 Full Course
summary: Learn Next.js by building a full-stack application. This comprehensive tutorial covers the App Router, Server Components, data fetching, and more.

title: JavaScript Animation Tutorial with GSAP
summary: Add stunning animations to your websites with the GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP). Learn how to animate DOM elements, create timelines, and build complex sequences.

title: Angular for Beginners
summary: A complete introduction to the Angular framework. Learn about components, services, dependency injection, and routing to build powerful single-page applications.

title: Three.js Tutorial for Beginners
summary: Learn how to create stunning 3D graphics in the browser with Three.js. This tutorial covers the basics of scenes, cameras, lighting, and rendering 3D models.

title: SvelteKit Full Course
summary: Build a modern web application with SvelteKit. Learn about file-based routing, server-side rendering, and form actions in this comprehensive course.

title: Create a Portfolio with Framer Motion
summary: Build a beautiful animated portfolio website using React and Framer Motion. This tutorial focuses on creating fluid animations and micro-interactions.

title: Node.js and Express.js - Full Course
summary: Learn how to build a REST API from scratch using Node.js and the Express framework. This course covers routing, middleware, and connecting to a database.

title: Python for Everybody - Full University Course
summary: A comprehensive introduction to Python programming. This course is designed for absolute beginners and covers all the fundamental concepts of Python.

title: Learn Go Programming - Golang Tutorial for Beginners
summary: An introduction to the Go programming language. Learn about Go's syntax, concurrency features, and how to build simple applications.

title: Build a REST API with Django REST Framework
summary: Create a powerful REST API using Python and the Django REST Framework. This tutorial covers serializers, viewsets, authentication, and permissions.

title: Microservices with Node.js and RabbitMQ
summary: Learn how to design and build a microservices architecture using Node.js for the services and RabbitMQ for message brokering.

title: Complete Guide to SQL and Databases
summary: A comprehensive guide to SQL, covering everything from basic queries to advanced topics like joins, subqueries, and transactions.

title: Learn Rust - A full course for beginners
summary: Get started with the Rust programming language. This course covers ownership, borrowing, structs, enums, and other core concepts.

title: Docker Tutorial for Beginners
summary: Learn the fundamentals of Docker, including images, containers, volumes, and networking. This tutorial will get you up and running with containerization.

title: GraphQL Full Course
summary: Learn how to build and consume GraphQL APIs. This course covers the fundamentals of GraphQL, including schemas, queries, mutations, and subscriptions.

title: MERN Stack Full Project: Build a Social Media App
summary: A complete guide to building a full-stack social media application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).

title: Build a Full-Stack App with Next.js, Prisma, and PostgreSQL
summary: Create a modern, full-stack application using Next.js for the frontend and backend, Prisma as the ORM, and PostgreSQL for the database.

title: Build a Full Stack E-commerce App with Django and Vue.js
summary: Develop a feature-rich e-commerce platform using Django for the backend and Vue.js for the interactive frontend.

title: Build and Deploy a Full Stack App with Firebase
summary: Learn how to build a serverless web application using Firebase for authentication, database, and hosting. This project uses React for the frontend.

title: Flutter & Firebase Full Course
summary: Build a complete cross-platform application with Flutter and Firebase. This course covers everything from UI design to backend integration.

title: Create a Netflix Clone with React and Tailwind CSS
summary: Build a Netflix-style streaming app interface using React for the UI and Tailwind CSS for styling. This project also shows how to fetch movie data from an API.

title: T3 Stack Tutorial
summary: Learn the T3 Stack (Next.js, TypeScript, tRPC, Prisma, Tailwind CSS) by building a full-stack application. This tutorial focuses on type-safe, end-to-end development.

title: Flutter for Beginners
summary: A complete guide to learning Flutter, Google's UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase.

title: React Native Crash Course for Beginners
summary: Learn the basics of React Native and build your first cross-platform mobile app. This crash course covers components, styling, and native APIs.

title: SwiftUI for Absolute Beginners
summary: An introduction to SwiftUI, Apple's modern framework for building apps for all Apple platforms. Learn how to create views, controls, and layouts declaratively.

title: Kotlin for Android Development
summary: Learn the Kotlin programming language and how to use it to build modern Android applications. This course is for beginners with no prior Android experience.

title: Build an Instagram Clone with SwiftUI and Firebase
summary: A comprehensive tutorial on building a full-featured Instagram clone for iOS using SwiftUI for the UI and Firebase for the backend.

title: Animations in React Native
summary: Learn how to create smooth and performant animations in React Native using the Animated API and Reanimated 2.

title: Jetpack Compose: The Full Course for Beginners
summary: Learn Jetpack Compose, Android's modern toolkit for building native UI. This course covers layouts, state management, and theming.
